text: konege avanu avarannu raksisidaga, avaru bhumiyalli an'yayavagi mereyalarambhisuttare. Manavare, nim'ma bandayavu khandita nim'ma palige vinasakariyagide. Ihaloka jivanada bandavala (tira simita). A balika nivu nam'ma kadege maraluviri. Aga, nivu enella maduttiddiri embudannu nimage navu tilisuvevu
